greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f. satisfies: A(x) = 1 + x/A(-x)^2.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: G.f. satisfies: A(x) = G(x/A(x)^2) where G(x) = A(x*G(x)^2) is the g.f. of A006319 (royal paths in a lattice).
G.f. satisfies: A(x) = sqrt( x/Series_Reversion( x*C(x/(1-x)^2)^2 ) ) where C(x) = 1 + x*C(x)^2 = (1-sqrt(1-4*x))/(2*x) is the g.f. of the Catalan numbers (A000108).
example: The g.f. G(x) of A006319 begins:
where G(x) = A(x*G(x)^2) and G(x/A(x)^2) = A(x);
also, G(x) = F(x/(1-x)^2) where F(x) = 1 + x*F(x)^2 is g.f. of A000108:
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jun 07 2012
